reference: Auerbach, Alan J. and Laurence J. Kotlikoff. Boston: Kluver-Nijoff Publishing, 1983, pp. 121-149.
Cutler, David M. Tax Reform end the Stock Market: An Asset Price Approach. American Economic Review 78 (1988): 1107-1117.
Downs, Thomas and Hassan Tehranian. Predicting Stock Price Responses to Tax Policy Changes. American Economic Review 78 -(1988): 1118-1130.
Feldstein, Martin. The Tax Cut: Why the Market Dropped. The Wall Street Journal, November 11, 1981, p. 26.
Fullerton, Don and Yolanda }Codrzycki Henderson. Long Run Effects of the Accelerated Cost Recovery System. Review of Economics and Statistics 67 (1985): 363-372.

Gordon, Roger H., James R. Hines, Jr., and Lawrence H. Summers. Notes on the Tax Treatment of Structures, in Martin Feldstein, ed. , The Effects of Taxes on Capital Accumulation. Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1987, pp. 223-254.

Lyon, Andrew B. How Do Stock Prices Change when Corporate Tax Laws Change? An enpirical Analysis of the Effect of Tax Laws on the Value of the Firm. Unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Princeton University, 1986.
Lyon, Andrew B. The Effect of the Investment Tax Credit on the Value of the Firm. Journal of Public Economics, forthcoming 1989.
